title: CodeRabbit's AI Code Reviews Now Live Free in VS Code, Cursor
author: Darryl K Taft
description: CodeRabbit integrates AI-powered code reviews directly into VS Code, Cursor and Windsurf editors for free, targeting quality control gaps as AI-generated code proliferates across development teams.
cntitle: CodeRabbit 的 AI 代码审查现已在 VS Code、Cursor 中免费上线
cndescription: CodeRabbit 将 AI 驱动的代码审查直接集成到 VS Code、Cursor 和 Windsurf 编辑器中，而且是免费的，目标是解决随着 AI 生成的代码在开发团队中激增而产生的质量控制缺口。
